title:
Boundary determination of the Riemannian metric by the elastic
  Dirichlet-to-Neumann map
abstract:
For a compact connected Riemannian manifold with smooth boundary, by
computing the full symbol of the elastic Dirichlet-to-Neumann map, we prove
that the elastic Dirichlet-to-Neumann map can uniquely determine the partial
derivatives of all orders of the Riemannian metric on the boundary of the
manifold.
